channel.title: Front End on Alessandro Mencarini
channel.description: Recent content in Front End on Alessandro Mencarini

item.title: Trying out Elm
item.description: I’ve been out of the front-end game for a while, and decided to dip my toes back again after roughly 2 years of little-to-none JavaScript. So many things happened in the meanwhile! React, Redux, Flux, Om… What should I use to get back on track? As I’ve been dabbling a lot in Elixir and Phoenix space, I saw in the community a growing interest for Elm, a functional language that compiles to JavaScript.
